body_html:
For those who have a similar issue. I had to modify the content of the file bazel-tensorflow/external/protobuf/BUILD, re-ran bazel build command and it helped to resolve this issue in my case.

Before:

LINK_OPTS = select({
    ":android": [],
    "//conditions:default": ["-lpthread"],
})

New:

LINK_OPTS = select({
    ":android": [],
    "//conditions:default": ["-lpthread","-lrt","-lm"],
})
body:
For those who have a similar issue. I had to modify the content of the file `bazel-tensorflow/external/protobuf/BUILD`, re-ran bazel build command  and it helped to resolve this issue in my case.

Before:

```
LINK_OPTS = select({
    ":android": [],
    "//conditions:default": ["-lpthread"],
})
```

New:

```
LINK_OPTS = select({
    ":android": [],
    "//conditions:default": ["-lpthread","-lrt","-lm"],
})
```
